content:
Bollywood dancing is so much fun! I'm glad you're considering attending a workshop. Rohan, you say? I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or real-time information about specific instructors or community centers. However, it's great that you had a positive experience with him before!

If you enjoyed his teaching style and the workshop, it's likely you'll have a blast at the next one. Bollywood dance is an excellent way to get some exercise, learn new moves, and experience the vibrant culture of India.

Before you attend the workshop, you might want to:

* Check the workshop's level and ensure it's suitable for your skill level.
* Wear comfortable clothing and shoes that allow for freedom of movement.
* Bring water and a towel to stay hydrated and comfortable.
* Be prepared to learn new moves, have fun, and not take yourself too seriously!
* Consider bringing a friend or two to share the experience with.

Remember to stretch before and after the workshop, and don't hesitate to ask Rohan or his assistants if you need any help or modifications during the class.

Have a fantastic time at the workshop, and I hope you get to bust out some amazing Bollywood moves!
